name: CATCH THE PHONE!
description:
ops! You accidentally dropped your phone, and if the screen broke, it's all over. But there's still hope! As long as you act fast. There is still a chance to save your precious phone!

Rules
  • Don't let your phone hit the ground!
  • You need to move your arms to lift the phone! 
  • Your phone gives you three chances!
Controls
  • Rise your left arm: Q
  • Rise your Right arm: E

GameDesign: Zhang JiMing 

Art: Zhang YuQuan 

Programme: Zhang JiMing

My LD50 page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/catch-the-phone
